eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc

Class FoodCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc.FoodCalculator

  • public class FoodCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to calculate saturation of custom food items. Also handles effects like health regain based on lore.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    PlayerItemConsumeEvent

    • Method Detail

      • tryToConsume

        public static void tryToConsume(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Lets a player consume an item, if it is valid and the cooldown is ready. If it was a succes the item is removed and an eating sound is played. A new event is called to apply the item effects.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who tris to consume the item.
        itemStack - The item the player tries to consume.
        See Also:
        PlayerItemConsumeEvent, applyItemEffects(PlayerItemConsumeEvent)

      • applyItemEffects

        public static void applyItemEffects(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerItemConsumeEvent event)
        Applies status effects based on a consumed item's lore. This includes saturation, healing and temperature modifiers.
        Parameters:
        event - The consumtion event.
        See Also:
        ItemUtils.getSaturation(ItemStack), ItemUtils.getHealing(ItemStack), ItemUtils.getHeatResistance(ItemStack), ItemUtils.getColdResistance(ItemStack)

      • parseEffectTicksToShort

        public static short parseEffectTicksToShort(long value,
                                            long added)
        Adds duration minutes to a status effect, gained from food. Used to parse minutes too ticks and prevent overflows.
        Parameters:
        value - The current value in 5 second ticks.
        added - The minutes added to the effect.
        Returns:
        The increased value.
